meanings.definition: A person or thing that is least liked or preferred.
meanings.sent2: The unfavorite student in the class always sits alone.
meanings.sent3: I find it funny how my unfavorite color is the same as my best friend's favorite color.
meanings.sent4: The unfavorite toy in the box was the broken one.
meanings.sent5: The unfavorite movie of all time was universally disliked by everyone who watched it.

meanings.definition: To remove from a list of favorites or preferences.
meanings.sent1: I had to unfavorite that song because it reminded me of a sad memory.
meanings.sent2: She decided to unfavorite the restaurant after receiving poor service.
meanings.sent3: It's time to unfavorite this old sweater and make room for new clothes.
meanings.sent4: He unfavorite the app when it started crashing constantly.
meanings.sent5: The decision to unfavorite her ex's photos on social media was liberating.
